member.name: T:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository
member.summary: Provides CRUD operations for the Address entity.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the AddressRepository class.
member.param: The PersonDbContext object.

member.name: M:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository.GetAllAddresses
member.summary: Retrieves all addresses from the database.
member.returns: An IEnumerable collection of Address objects.

member.name: M:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository.GetAddressByGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves an address from the database by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the address to retrieve.
member.returns: The Address object with the specified ID, or null if no such address exists.

member.name: M:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository.CreateAddress(Person.API.Entities.Address)
member.summary: Adds a new address to the database.
member.param: The Address object to be added.
member.returns: The Address object that was added to the database.

member.name: M:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository.DeleteAddress(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes an address from the database by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the address to delete.
member.returns: A Task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Person.API.Data.Repository.AddressRepository.UpdateAddress(System.Guid,Person.API.Entities.Address)
member.summary: Updates an existing address in the database.
member.param: The ID of the address to update.
The updated Address object.
member.returns: The Address object that was updated in the database, or null if no such address exists.
